website_summaries.verdict: Product uses 100% human hair vs. synthetic fibers as only ingredient, offering a more natural look.
pros: Electro-statically adheres to your own hair gives "illusion" of a fuller head of hair
Takes just minutes to apply with great outcome to enhance overall appearance
Looks like real hair follicles under light to blend with own
cons: May need company's holding spray product to help adhere better to scalp
Fibers may shift when sleeping or styling
Fallen fibers on neck could feel prickly and irritate

customer_reviews.title: No Bueno
customer_reviews.text: If you sweat do not use this product. Even the water resistant spray is false advertising, the spray leaves a white residue on your hair. Once you apply just don't touch it or go near strong winds or let women or kids touch your head and you'll be fine. Just put it on and stay indoors away from the world.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle. This stuff is amazing and has saved me from embarrassment! I am a 37 year old female and had dreads for 9 years. I went to the wrong person, who twisted my hair too tight. Noticed thining so I decided to cut them only to discover rows of bald spots. Searched for the right cover up product and stumbled accross this jewel. I definitely would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Saved by the bell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.text: I lost my hair at the age of 16 and have tried everything to regrow it with no success. All I wanted was the appearance of a full head of hair and hair illusions has given me what I've be looking for for years! Thank you for developing this product....restoring my confidence and rebuilding my self esteem!
customer_reviews.author: AjStylz

customer_reviews.title: An amazing product that has increased my wife's confidence
customer_reviews.text: An amazing product that has increased my wife's confidence. Due to the tension in her scalp from braids and dreadlocks, her hair thinned to the point of bald spots. After I applied Hair Illusion, the bald spots disappeared and her hair is fuller. This product is a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A.

customer_reviews.title: What a WASTE of money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would be better than Toppik. NO WAY. I paid a lot for it and when I opened it the see-through container was only about 75% full. Then, using it once...I used about a third of it! I need it all over the top of my head. This would cost way too much. Then, it fell off my head into the sink. It seemed to get all over the place. I do spray my hair, but even that didn't help completely. I woke up this morning and I am used to a small amount of Toppik on my pillow...this Illusion stuff was all over the place, even on my sheet!!!! I hated it.
customer_reviews.author: ALO

customer_reviews.title: Too thick and grainy for my hair.
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak for everyone but for me this stuff was way too thick, way too grainy and wouldn't stay in place long enough for me to spray it. I've used Toppik and a bunch of the other products. I got the best results with Toppik too bad it's so expensive . They want you to put spray on first to make it stick and then more spray on top. Too much spray and too much trouble. Fortunately they allow returns despite what I read. On the positive side: The box and bottle was a nice presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Just like getting tiny hair fibers all over your neck when you get a haircut...
customer_reviews.text: I've used lots of different brands of hair fibers, and probably should have known that human hair fibers were not cling to my scalp like the others. I had tiny bits f hair stuck all over my face! Wish I could return it what a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Maine95

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The particles do not stick to the hair. It's falling off the shoulders. It causes very intense itching. I had to take a shower every time.
customer_reviews.author: Ertugrul

customer_reviews.title: But a $10 alternative - it'll be better than this
customer_reviews.text: I've tried quite a bit hair concealing fibers, and this is 100% the worst of all of them. The fibers literally just fall out of your hair with any slight head movement. Thank God I tried it out at home before I went in public - I would have a forehead full of dark brown dust. I'd rate this zero stars if possible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a little over a week now, and this product is definitely better than the rest of the competition. For African American hair it blends in almost perfectly. I use it to fill in my receding corners and nobody can ever tell im using. I was using nanogen and was mostly satisfied until i tried this one. Comparing the two I would say that nanogen is more like a powder substance. Hair illusion uses actual human hair in which you can definitely tell when using the product. If African American i would definitely recommend using this one over any other.
customer_reviews.author: Truth1111

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Do not work for me it falls all over your face.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Moore

customer_reviews.title: Instant Hair!
customer_reviews.text: This is one amazing product! My daughter, who is a professional hair stylist could not tell what was "different" about my hair...my wife is amazed with the results...I could not be happier. This actually works, and really does look natural. It is a process however, but after a few applications, it can be done in a few minutes. The only downside is the constant cleanup on your pillow...and the need for lots of hold spray. But still the best results you can ask for!
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: ok so before i bought this i was skeptical as all hell, but i decided to bite the bullet and i must say i'm surprised that it actually does what it says its going to do, give the illision that you have hair. It would work best for people who keep their hair cut short tho. i see alot of people complaining about small s*** but my advice is find your own way to apply it and stop being a little bitch, trial and error people. YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR.. Oh and i didnt give it 5 stars because its a tad bit messy and tough to clean up p.s. dont sweat too hard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no staying power.
customer_reviews.text: This product is the most authentic looking. It looks like real hair.unlike others which look like dirt. The biggest downside is it has no staying power at all . Even with their brand holding spray.it actually falls out with slight facial expressions. I think they made it that way purposely so you'll have to restock sooner.do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Itchy shedding mess
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. Even though I used the Spritz prior to applying, it's still sheds and gets everywhere. I've been itchy for days. It certainly does act like real hair. You know that hair everywhere itchy feeling that you get right after a haircut? Well that's it! Does not stay in place synthetics are much better. Will probably be returning or Caboki
customer_reviews.author: Roddo

customer_reviews.title: Yes like a real hair , berry good
customer_reviews.text: Work real good , 5 stars , look yes like my real hair , is my first time , so I ask my sister to do the back of my head , is hard for me ,to do it but after looks so real hair , now my question is if I wear my winter hat , will be a problem ? I live in Massachussets is cool and snow , will see how goes ?
customer_reviews.author: Julio Fino

customer_reviews.title: Go with another type not this
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this was the worst kind of hair fibers I have ever used. It is very itchy and even if you try and set it, it won't stay in place. Transfers easy or falls on clothing, neck, shoulder.... I would not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice R.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. It does not adhere to your hair ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. It does not adhere to your hair like Toppik. There was no “static” bonding as claimed. It just goes everywhere and looks fake. The fiber hold spray that goes with product did absolutely nothing. Product also would not come off forehead or skin surrounding hair easily. I have used Toppik for over 10 years so I am very familiar with products that are like this.
customer_reviews.author: W. J.

customer_reviews.title: The simple joy of hair
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use initially I thought I had to go to a barbershop so they can use the accessories. No I was able to apply style and use my own spritz to hold it. Now I love it, I look like teenage years. I even fool myself and others around me as I get the hair style and beard I always desire. I order the hold spray don't like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon

customer_reviews.title: Imagine having a haircut with the hair all over your neck
customer_reviews.text: This product is over priced and is nothing like XFusion, Toppick or other hair fillers I've used. It's like someone emptied a beard trimmer with all the clippings that do not adhere to scalp or hair. It's messy and the hair shed all over your skin and clothes causing you to itch like crazy . Imagine having a haircut without the cape and the hair is all over your neck, face ect. I had to use baby powder to remove the product from my neck. It gets everywhere!! Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A_Moon

customer_reviews.title: Allergic?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what it is but possibly I’m allergic to the “hair”! I have been using this type of product for a while, yet with this one, it seems it falls into my face, driving me crazy and itchy. Going back to my previous brand...
customer_reviews.author: D. Tedesco

customer_reviews.title: Product Needs Improvements
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this product. The holes are too small or the fibers are too big. Once its out of the bottle it clumps and does not distribute evenly and cleanly as pictured. It's more expensive than another product I use. The dark brown is too dark, it's almost black which is too dark for my complexion. As of today I would not purchase this product again. I am very loyal once I find something that works well.
customer_reviews.author: Raye

customer_reviews.title: Cost too much & not the product you think
customer_reviews.text: Like others have stated, it doesn’t stick that well. It does get all over the sink. Hard to get out & doesn’t just wipe off from forehead. It also doesn’t work like any of the videos you can watch on youtube. That could be because it’s better that someone else does it for you that knows how. Expensive when you end up having to use more to make it work. Yes, it is real hair fibers but with hairspray it’s like cement. It doesn’t look realistic for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for maintaining your sexy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After doing extensive research on which product to use without it looking like we use products, we've decided that this was the perfect choice........if you'd like to maintain your sexy then purchase, follow the easy instructions and enjoy a few more minutes of youthfulness! !!
customer_reviews.author: Angerine

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  I don't have to shave my head now.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and so does my wife. I thought my days of having hair was over since my hairline was receding and I'd developed a ball spot at the top of my head. This product covered it perfectly. It looks very real. My pillow is having a hard time though, so I purchased some spritz from a local beauty supply store to hold it all in-place. This is Day 4 and I am still trying to perfect it. I cut my own hair, so I have added another 15 min to my morning routine. I think I will purchase a doo-rag today to cut my pillow some slack. I love the results.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: It’s Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I Dislike This Product. I Purchased this product and the recommended hold spray followed the directions every time I comb my hair it comes out all over my clothes not what I expected It’s not covering ball spots as advertised I would like a refund
customer_reviews.author: John H Stone 3rd

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bald spot on the crown of my head. I wanted to cover it. I came across Hair Illustration. From what I read it sounded perfect. However the negatives outway the positives. It doesn't stay on your head. It gets all over the sink. When you lay down it gets all over the pillow. It's also itchy. My scalp became irritated. It definitely doesn't stay on your head for a week like it says on the bottle. I probably won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product
customer_reviews.text: Worst Product. It is not as simple as it shows in video. Small particles of hair falls on shirt always. If it is white shirt, hair particles will be easily visible to everyone. If you comb, it will all stick to your comb. No one can use that comb further, without wash. Pillows, Bed, Bathroom, Carpet, Sofa, Shirts everywhere small particles. Will try to add some pictures later. I will return this.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY product you should buy...
customer_reviews.text: Hair Illusion...where have you been all my life?? Well maybe not all my life...but after I turned 40....are you kidding me?? UNREAL...can't tell that it is not your real hair...other products...especially the one you see now in all ESPN commercials...GARBAGE...who the hell wants black powder on their head??? WOW...anyway...just apply CORRECTLY...spray holding spray....before AND after when applying the fibers.....customer for life!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: Wont stick at all it just looks like u got a haircut and all those little hairs ...
customer_reviews.text: Wont stick at all it just looks like u got a haircut and all those little hairs stuck to your face, havent tried it for facial hair hopefully that will have some benefit but other than that it just drops straight to the bottom, not so much if u use hairspray but still drops and it looks unnatural and all i have is a widows peak
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Scalp Itch Nonstop & Poor Holding Power
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is great; I love the shaker container this comes in. The product itself, however, is the worst I've tried because it itches terribly. Coverage is good, but other brands I used had better lasting power. Hair Illusion would not stay in place regardless of how much holding mist or holding spray I used. I will NOT reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: Amazing... tried a spray hair volumizer and was totally and utterly infuriated with the results. Tried this and no one can tell the difference. I am a black male and wears my hair about a #1 and this product is so easy to use its a no brainer. I sweat a lot and have used this while I was at the gym and no hairs moved. Over the days you can tell it's getting a little thinner so I just add a little more to blend it in. Started answering text messages like "who this? New Hair!"
customer_reviews.author: Not so good

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: The HAIR ILLUSION - 100% Natural Real Human Hair Fibers black color worked excellently with my thinning hair. It matched my hair perfectly and with the holding spray (Water Resisted) lasted and stayed on my head for a week until I washed my hair. It is the best product that I have used to cover up my thinning hair. I would recommend it to anyone that needs to cover up thinning hair or a ball spot on your head. Sincerely, TW
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Looks Like Your Real Hair
customer_reviews.text: I've been using other top named products for several years now. They were descent, but Hair Illusion beats them hands down for a more natural look. The only problem I have with it is, if you use it regularly, you'll need to purchase it more often than the other products, as it require quite a bit more of the fibers to give you coverage. That being said, using it gives you a look that is nearly indistinguishable from your real hair.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G Smith

customer_reviews.title: Hear
customer_reviews.text: Good afternoon, for the third or fourth time I bought this product and to my sadness I opened only now and came across a color that is not mine, I do not understand because I always selected black and came another color as can help me I have nothing to do with is clear color if my hair is black will I be in miami 18/01 could exchange-cleaned me? Thank you for the attention Miriam Kleuser
customer_reviews.author: miriam b. kleusert

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only just started using it, but this is an amazing product. Cannot tell the difference between my hair and this, because it’s actual hair fibers. I’ve used synthetic fibers before, but Hair Illusions is by far a superior product. Spritz before and after with some kind of holding spray and you’re good to go with these staying in place all day.
customer_reviews.author: D Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Looks like real hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It looks like my hair. I've been using it for years. The top of my head is bald, but this covers it. I have to spray my head first for it to stick, since there is no hair for it to stick to. Only recommendation is you cannot ride in the car with your windows down because it will blow off. It can withstand normal wind and rain pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Roj

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Felt like sand and acted like sand. Just made a mess . It does work but you waste alot.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Did not like this product
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product. As others have said its like taking trimmings and dumping them on your head. They fall off in your face constantly. I use GOFYBR and it is the best. I ran out in a torrential down pour yesterday and the stuff stayed in place. Im confident this product would not do that. I can see this product being used maybe at a barber convention but not for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good coverage, even on bald areas.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. To get best results, be sure to use the holding spray before & after applying product.
customer_reviews.author: JCC

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, I would not recommend this product..
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for one month.. I am not satisfied at all.. Pros: Natural human hair, covers up the patches better.. Cons: On long run it causes hair fall.. it leaves a residue on the scalp which is difficult to wash away.. I had to use cotton swabs to remove the residue from my scalp.. I lost much more hair removing this residue..
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is horrible
customer_reviews.text: The color is way off and the stuff pours out of the bottle like a waterfall. I had to wash my hair again it was so bad. And the price is WAYYYYYY too high. Don't buy
customer_reviews.author: qualitykate

customer_reviews.title: It definitely works and looks natural.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to see if it's the real deal and it is. I have scarring on my skin along my beard and some patches of missing hair...wash, brush, apply some grease (since it doesnt stay on bald areas) and it makes my beard look fuller and hides the scarring. Definitely a confidence booster. Lasts the entire day at work no issues until i shower. 4 stars since it can get messy and if you touch or brush on it the hair will come off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Not better than other products like toppik or cabuki. Expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Chung

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The most stupid thing you ever can bay. DO NOT WAIST YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Berisha

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Didnt like reason for is this product does cover bald spots but u have to use hairspray to make it stay in place
customer_reviews.author: joshua avila

customer_reviews.title: It was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It was a waste of money. I bought this for my husband who sometimes uses something similar to this at the barbershop. When he tried to use it at home it wouldn't work out right because he said he need a spray bottle(something like a perfume bottle with the rubber pump) in order to use it. So needless to say, I bought this for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Manifest That Shhh

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using this product for over a year now and absolutely loves it....
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product, it itches like when you get a ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product, it itches like when you get a haircut and dont shower. Also gets all over your pillowcase at night, making for the ultimate itchy scratchy show....... Dont do it.....
customer_reviews.author: john medina

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product.
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product... Do not buy!! The fact that its a real hair is why its bad.. it doesntvstick on head.. and makes a lot of miss .. other products that are powder like are better
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my significant other. This is a great product and even barbers have a hard time noticing that he has stuff in his hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tameka Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Some dudes Shaved whiskers  in a bottle .
customer_reviews.text: Toppik is far superior product . Ordered this product briefly due to shortage of Toppik . Hair feel is prickly compared to Toppik or Xfusion . Big downside is Hair Illusion supply does not last as long Toppik. Hair Illusion is like emptying a strangers shaved whiskers onto yourself .
customer_reviews.author: Joe Michaels

customer_reviews.title: The next best thing to actual hair PERIOD!
customer_reviews.text: I recent bought this product for my son and i cant say enough great things about it! It truly gives the illusion of actual hair. You would never know the difference unlike those other products being sold, which resemble black baby powder. THESE are actual FIBERS. My son who's balding prematurely, is absolutely thrilled to have such a product to use. It has restored his confidence. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Immaculate Hair Product! It is Certainly Worth a Try!
customer_reviews.text: This product applies effortlessly and is incredibly easy to use. For individuals like myself who have hair challenges, these hair fibers actually adhere to my natural hair well. The hold spray allows me to have the desired thickness and volume i need for the product to blend with my natural hair style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY AT ALL WITH THIS SECOND ORDER OF THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product twice was really happy with this product. When i started to run out of the first order of product I ordered another one. Now the second order of this product is definitely not the same as the first time I ordered. The fibers r like powder mostly like the other product that are out. I’m so very disappointed not sure why you guys changed your product but this is definitely not the same product you sold me the first time. Not real looking at all ..
customer_reviews.author: Got it made

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do as promised
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing product. They claim they use natural hair fibers however when I applied over (not even a bald spot) but thinning hair the fibers are splotchy on your hairline making it OBVIOUS rather than a natural look. Complete waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: gary palaypay

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product, especially now that they have reduced the price which makes it a little more competitive with similar products. This was my second order.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I don’t believe in this product ok
customer_reviews.text: I just put some on the spot that bald and it stay for a few minutes and drop off.... I am so disappointed with this product and don’t see what to like about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Antrobe

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: The holding spray doesn’t work and the fibers fall all over your face and clothes. If you touch your hair the fibers fall out. Horrible...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product for thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for thinning hair I use it with spritz strong hold it last but when you shower and shampoo it will fall out the 39.00 dollar bottle is really small for that price I was expecting a bigger bottle, however it's a great product just be mindful of the amount of spritz you spray because it will turn your hair white it's not like the blackout sprays it's more realistic
customer_reviews.author: Eric Walker

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Product
customer_reviews.text: I HAD been using TOPPIK for over 10 years UNTIL I found HAIR ILLUSION. This Product is like NO OTHER. It is 100%natural Looking And Very Efficient which means you use LESS which means you will SAVE you ALOT of money over time. But I do recommend buying their pump applicator to achieve the maximum result. I give this product a SOLID 5 STAR RATING in EVERY way! ...
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It gets everywhere. Stick to the more expensive brands if you want it to stick to your head and actually stay there. Looked clumpy and fake.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Ring

customer_reviews.title: Not full bottle
customer_reviews.text: Really my bottle came 3/4 full smh. This never happened before. This stuff cost too much for that
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Ramey

customer_reviews.title: Great product for small areas
customer_reviews.text: Great product for small areas. Quick tip: if you want it to stay, sprinkle some on and then spray some hairspray in the area you sprinkled it on. It will stay for atleast two days!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: This is horrible! I applied it on the parts of scalp ...
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible! I applied it on the parts of scalp that I needed to cover. It did cover the area but the problem was it didn't stay in that area. Its tiny pieces of hair as described but it does not adhere to the scalp so if your hair moves even after hair sprayed you will see particals on your face ,scalp,clothes..Im going back to Toppick that will stay on the spot your trying to conceal.
customer_reviews.author: SerenaFrancoeur

customer_reviews.title: Yessszzziiirrrr
customer_reviews.text: It works......the key is making sure it's applied evenly. Get a hair applicator to apply it with or you will have it everywhere and in "clunks"...i.like this better than Toppik...if you have a few light spots this will get you back right lol
customer_reviews.author: kiwi

customer_reviews.title: I have more hair now, beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, it comes out easy, holds my hair well and can not tell that my hair is thin.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! However, the only thing I dont like is that it gets all over my clothes. Is there a setting spray to hold this firmly in place? Otherwise I love my product! Thumbs up!!!!:)
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: This item did not work for me very disappointed in the product and the money I wasted. I'm giving this product 4 stars even though it did not work for me I had phenomenal customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is so amazing it's like magic. I take it everywhere especially when traveling. A few little shakes and boom! My husbands hair (and mine!) looks full and natural. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Money wasted
customer_reviews.text: Comes out of hair quickly, difficult to remove from skin, which resuls is an unnatural look. (like I poured pepper in my hair) I'm switching back to synthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Kevan S. Weinhold

customer_reviews.title: Good for women as well as men
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for several weeks I've found it to cover very well with a natural look.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Giving the most realistic look possible
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product I use it for my clients and they live how natural and real it looks! Especially compared to other fibers that look good but don’t always give a natural look
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: It was great for hiding a bald spot on the back of ...
customer_reviews.text: A little messy each time you scratch your head your finger nails are full of black from the product. I also found that it was quite noticeable that you had something on your head. They advertise the product as if it does not show, but it does. It was great for hiding a bald spot on the back of the head.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Thought I give my dad something to try since he ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought I give my dad something to try since he is having a mid-life crisis. After 4 months of using he said it works BUT its a mess to clean up. In the end, I think he is accepting the enviable.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product, it’s actual hair so it doesn’t look artificial like other brands and will last about 2-3 days before the texture starts to look more like greasy matted hair. It does however needs its own brand of an applicator the way Toppik has one. Just needs to not get clogged. Overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Larger fibers make for easier application and coverage
customer_reviews.text: I like that Hair Illusions has larger fibers than Toppik as it makes for easier application and coverage.

customer_reviews.title: The worst ever

customer_reviews.title: Back in the game.
customer_reviews.text: Hi Ronnie, I just want to personally tell you thanks man. I'm a 40 year old man that has been lifting weights heavy & watching my diet for over 6 years trying to keep it young. But one thing that I couldn't keep was my hair line. But let me say ever since I discovered your product I don't look 40 anymore I look 30 thanks to coupling your product with my workouts I'm back in the game. Got young chics looking @ me again. SERIOUSLY BRO! THANKS RONNIE YOU SAVED ME.

customer_reviews.title: Great temporary use but would absolutely recommend surgery or medication ...
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable how well this works to mask small thinning spots. Takes 20 years off your head! The only draw back is if you touch it the hair fibers gets on your hands and it looks a little nappy on the application area from the hair spray. Great temporary use but would absolutely recommend surgery or medication for natural hair growth.

product_meta.title: HAIR ILLUSION Hair Fibers for the Balding, Thinning Hair of Men and Women 100% Natural Texture Hair Loss Concealer
feature_bullets: CREATES A FULLER, THICKER APPEARANCE: Eliminate the unwelcome appearance of thinning hair with the natural REAL hair building fibers in Hair Illusion. Ideal for both men and women, the hair thickener uses real hair fibers, allowing you to instantly create the appearance of a thicker, fuller head of hair for a more youthful look.

SUPERIOR ALL DAY HOLD: Never flakey, the hair concealer is made with natural real hair fibers that will not stain the scalp, the pillow or clothing. It is recommended that individuals wear a nightcap or doo rag to extend the lifespan of each application.

NATURAL HAIR FIBERS: Made with 100% natural real hair fibers, Hair Illusion is completely natural for a discreet look that is undetectable. Also great for covering scars and cleaning up patchy beards, the natural hair fibers seamlessly blend with the existing hair with no unsightly transition

PERFECT FOR ALL HAIR TYPES: Available in multiple shades to best match your natural color, the premium natural hair thickener is perfect for all hair types, including naturally curly hair, coarse, medium and fine hair.

SYNTHETIC FREE: Free from dyes, powders and synthetic ingredients such as keratin fibers, Hair Illusion’s real hair fibers electrostatically bond to your existing hair and scalp for a naturally thicker appearance. For an improved hold, use with Hair Illusion Fiber Hold On Spray.
